tableSchema.table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `lts_admin_node_onoffline_log` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `log_time` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `event` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `node_type` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL, `cluster_name` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `ip` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL, `port` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `host_name` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `group` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `create_time` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `threads` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `identity` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )
